text:
I am using log4j 1.2.8 in HP-UX 11i. I specified the
-Dlog4j.configuration=log4j.properties in my JVM arguments just like what I did
with my other applications. But now doing the same thing, nothing is being
printed in the standard output and in the log files. what seems to be the cause
of this inconsistency?
creator: jared.jfi@comclark.com
hoju@visi.com
text:
This assumes you have log4j.properties in the current working directory.  That
is, the directory from where the "java" command is started.  This is probably
what you did on your other systems where things worked, you just realize fully
why it worked.  If you want to leave the file in a single location and not worry
about running the application from that directory, then specify the fully
qualified path to it.

BTW, this is more of a question that should be asked first on the list.  You
should not be reporting a bug unless you've first done some verification that it
really is a bug.

Jake
